VIRTUAL RIDE JERSEYS VIRTUAL JERSEYS Once you reach $500 in fundraising, you’ll be rewarded with a virtual ride jersey. You can add a dedication to your jersey and, using Augmented Reality, can view your jersey among those of other riders across the country. Swipe to create or edit a virtual jersey. VIEW VIRTUAL JERSEYS You must give permissions to use your camera in your phone settings in order to use Virtual Jerseys. Congratulations! You’ve raised over $500 and earned a virtual Ride to End ALZ jersey! Tap below to create your jersey, and add a dedication and a message to go with it. Swipe to edit your virtual jersey. FUNDRAISING QR CODE Tap the copy icon by the QR Code to share it with friends or save to your device. The QR Code will take donors to your personal fundraising page. Make fundraising easy by sending your personal QR code to your fundraising page to friends and family. ASK FOR DONATIONS Swipe right to see all message options. Once you select a message, tap on the channel icon. Note for Facebook and LinkedIn you will need to paste the message from your clipboard. Select a fundraising message to give you inspiration and then pick your channel to share. SHARE LINK Copy your personal fundraising page to our clipboard to easily share your link on Instagram or TikTok. MAKE A DONATION Send Email Button Enter a credit card donation for your fundraising page. DONATION CREDIT Deposit a check and credit your fundraising page or team page instantly. Checks deposited will credit immediately and will not require data entry or offline processing. Who should get credit for the donation, your fundraising page, your team page, or team member if you\'re on a team? Have a check and want to make a deposit? It’s easy to deposit via the mobile app. You can take a picture of the front and back of the check. Confirm who gets fundraising credit and select “Deposit”. Keep the check for 10 days in case of a dispute. The check deposit should be credited within 1 business day. DEPOSIT CHECK required FIND AN EVENT Select an event to deposit a check to. Thank You! Your deposit is processing Deposit Complete Done There was an error submitting the check. Please check the data and try again. You must give permissions to use your camera in your phone settings in order to use check deposit. Select who the check will be crediting, either your participant page or your team page. Search for an active event to deposit the check to. Select who the check will be crediting, either a Participant of the event, a Team of the event, or a general event donation. Find an existing donor record to allocate the donation towards or create a new record. Take a picture of the front and back of the check. Endorse the check with “For Mobile Deposit Only” and keep the check for up to 10 days. Donor information will be pre-filled using the payor information from the check. If there is an update required, you can edit the information directly into the input field. All required fields will be validated before the check is deposited. Please enter a valid email address. Invalid zip code. Check amount must be in format #.##. DEPOSIT TYPE Deposit funds to a participant or fundraising event or an annual fund chapter. Please select the type of check desposit. Your points are calculated based on your activity that\’s tracked under Track Activity. View the common workout options and the points value associated with them. POINTS EARNED ACTIVITY POINTS Activities are listed by popularity, tap on View All to see all activity options. mi min pts
VIEW ALL ACTIVITY POINTS Activity Goal Points EARNING POINTS Points are earned based on amount of time of the workout. There is no minimum length for a workout and will be pro-rated if less than an hour. Points are earned in increments of 1 and will round to the nearest digit. You can manually add activity that wasn\’t logged by your activity tracker. Go to Activity Tracking \> Add Activity and follow the prompts. You can choose up to one activity tracking wearable to get your activity from, including AppleHealth, Google Fit and FitBit. Alternatively, if you do not want to sync to a wearable, you can also manually add activity.
